body:
Hi, @lxtGH. 
I got similar errors. Could you share how to solve this issue?? 


> (hrsimple) user@user:/sdata1/workspace/simple-pose$ python pose_estimation/valid.py     --cfg experiments/coco/resnet50/256x192_d256x3_adam_lr1e-3.yaml     --flip-test     --model-file models/pytorch/pose_coco/pose_resnet_50_256x192.pth.tar
> /sdata1/workspace/simple-pose/pose_estimation/../lib/core/config.py:161: YAMLLoadWarning: calling yaml.load() without Loader=... is deprecated, as the default Loader is unsafe. Please read https://msg.pyyaml.org/load for full details.
>   exp_config = edict(yaml.load(f))
> => creating output/coco/pose_resnet_50/256x192_d256x3_adam_lr1e-3
> => creating log/coco/pose_resnet_50/256x192_d256x3_adam_lr1e-3_2020-05-25-14-25
> Namespace(cfg='experiments/coco/resnet50/256x192_d256x3_adam_lr1e-3.yaml', coco_bbox_file=None, flip_test=True, frequent=100, gpus=None, model_file='models/pytorch/pose_coco/pose_resnet_50_256x192.pth.tar', post_process=False, shift_heatmap=False, use_detect_bbox=False, workers=None)
